verbose_text: The expression of these genes results in an altered core structure : migA is responsible for the addition of the L-rhamnose A (L-Rha A) in the alpha1 --> 6 linkage, preventing the addition of O-Ag to lipid A-core by the O-Ag ligase WaaL.
evidence: preventing the addition of O-Ag to lipid A-core by the O-Ag ligase WaaL
